flawed_nl_solution:
The bus journey takes 15 + 25 = <<15+25=40>>40 minutes.
The walk from the bus stop to his house will take Harry 40 / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20 minutes.
So he will have been traveling for 40 + 20 = <<40+20=63>>63 minutes.
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 63. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
